channel.title: Artist Endpoint on music
channel.description: Recent content in Artist Endpoint on music

item.title: Artist
item.description: An artist is generally a musician (or musician persona), group of musicians, or other music professional (like a producer or engineer). Occasionally, it can also be a non-musical person (like a photographer, an illustrator, or a poet whose writings are set to music), or even a fictional character. For some other special cases, see special purpose artists. Name The artist’s name is the official name of an artist, whether it is a person, band, or character.

item.title: Artist Albums
item.description: Create or Link Album with Artist This endpoint allows you to Link an Artist -> Album relation or create a new Artist with Relation. If no id is provided a new Album will be created. POST /api/artists/{artistID}/albums If the Album you want to link exists you can POST { "id": "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" } If you want to create a new Album: Request { "composerName": "Red Hot Chili Peppers", "discNumber": 1, "durationInMillis": 20000, "isrc": "USQY51021557", "name": "Another World", "releaseDate": "1996-03-14T10:27:31+00:00", "trackNumber": 1 } Response

item.title: Artist Members
item.description: Create or Link Member with Artist This endpoint allows you to Link an Member -> Album relation or create a new Artist with Relation. If no id is provided a new Member/Artist will be created. POST /api/artists/{artistID}/members If the Member you want to link exists you can POST { "id": "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" } If you want to create a new Member: Request { "ipi": "", "isni": "", "name": "Awesome brady", "sortName": "Awesome brady" } Response

item.title: Artist Songs
item.description: Create or Link Song with Artist This endpoint allows you to Link a Song -> Album relation or create a new Artist with Relation. If no id is provided a new Song will be created. POST /api/artists/{artistID}/songs If the Song you want to link exists you can POST { "id": "1607d150-861c-4782-8c1b-abe58254373b" } If you want to create a new Song: Request { "composerName": "Red Hot Chili Peppers", "discNumber": 1, "durationInMillis": 20000, "isrc": "USQY51021557", "name": "Aeroplane", "releaseDate": "1996-03-14T10:27:31Z" } Response

item.title: Artist Update
item.description: Update an Artist PATCH /api/artists/{id} @TODO: Write documentation
